__e: Doctor, we'd better get these people over to the infirmary.
Don't know what I can do for him but let's get him to Sickbay.
Let me get in here. Hold on. Come on.
- I want to check out my sickbay.
Look, if you really want to know how we feel... we'd be a lot better knowing you two were back in Sickbay... working on the cure for this.
You are to report to the infirmary and stay there until I send for you.
This is my Sick Bay and I will decide what goes on here. -But...
You went to the infirmary 16 times, and not once did you ever try to fight back.
As soon as we're close enough, beam the body to Sick Bay.
They're docking. We should have beamed the wounded directly to the infirmary.
Things move fast. I understand that, but with Elizabeth... incapacitated. I hate to say it, but...
I know you've been avoiding the Doctor, but don't tell me you've forgotten where Sick Bay is.
Did they tell you he was in the infirmary?
Hmm. I stand corrected. This may be just what you need to get you back to Sick Bay.
Well, there's not much point sitting in the infirmary waiting to die, is there?
Help me get her to Sick Bay.
